snippet: The boy was given 6 to 16 months in a therapeutic group home, after an older friend who helped push the cart received a similar sentence.
abstract: Twelve-year-old boy is sentenced to 6 to 16 months in a therapeutic home after pleading guilty to assault in a prank with a 13-year-old-friend that sent a shopping cart hurtling from a fourth-floor mall walkway in East Harlem, seriously injuring Marion Salmon Hedges.
lead_paragraph: The boy was given 6 to 16 months in a therapeutic group home, after an older friend who helped push the cart received a similar sentence.

headline.seo: Boy Who Pushed Shopping Cart Onto Woman in East Harlem Is Sentenced
